Cult.description: Cheech Marin and Tommy Chong star in this tale of two stoners in search of the perfect stash of hash who end up cruising around in a van made of pot.

Cult.title: The Evil Dead

Cult.title: The Interview
Cult.description: When a man who's seemingly lost everything is grabbed by police for questioning, it starts a twisted cat-and-mouse game between him and a detective.

Cult.title: Tales From the Hood 2

Cult.title: The Cruise
Cult.description: When the captain of a pleasant cruise ship mistakes a mischievous stowaway the entertainment director, wild and wacky hijinks ensue.

Cult.title: Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day

Cult.title: Pee-wee's Big Holiday
Cult.description: A chance encounter with a mysterious stranger (Joe Manganiello) points Pee-wee toward his destiny -- and his first-ever holiday!

Documentaries.title: Have a Good Trip: Adventures in Psychedelics

Documentaries.title: Circus of Books

Documentaries.title: No Direction Home: Bob Dylan

Documentaries.title: Fittest in Dubai

Documentaries.title: I Am Divine

Documentaries.title: Bathtubs Over Broadway

Documentaries.title: FYRE: The Greatest Party That Never Happened

Documentaries.title: Bethany Hamilton: Unstoppable

Documentaries.title: The Queen

Documentaries.title: Shirkers
Documentaries.description: In 1992, Sandi Tan and her friends shot a quirky film on the streets of Singapore. Then the footage disappeared, sending her on a hunt for answers.

Documentaries.title: Cutie and the Boxer

Documentaries.title: Heroin(e)

Documentaries.title: Virunga

Documentaries.title: Prelude to War

Documentaries.title: Period. End of Sentence.

Documentaries.title: The Battle of Midway

Documentaries.title: My Beautiful Broken Brain

Science & Nature.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
Science & Nature.description: From astronomical events to shapes and patterns in space, strange and wonderful phenomena are explored with modern science in this series.

Science & Nature.title: Absurd Planet

Science & Nature.title: The Universe
Science & Nature.description: Discover the secrets of the universe in this series that pairs animation with insights on distant planets, black holes and other celestial marvels.

Science & Nature.title: Ancient Aliens
Science & Nature.description: Were ancient humans really behind some of the most important technological advances in civilized history, or did they have extraterrestrial help?

Science & Nature.title: Our Planet

Stand-Up Comedy.description: Jenny Slate's first stand-up special is a mix of stage time, funny stories about adulthood and conversations with family in her childhood home.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tom Segura: Ball Hog
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Tom Segura scores laughs with uncomfortably candid stories about mothers, fathers, following your dreams — and other things you'd rather not think about.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ronny Chieng: Asian Comedian Destroys America!
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Ronny Chieng ("The Daily Show," "Crazy Rich Asians") takes center stage in this stand-up special and riffs on modern American life and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ryan Hamilton: Happy Face

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mike Birbiglia: Thank God for Jokes
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Mike Birbiglia takes the stage in Brooklyn and hits on hard truths about puppets, late people and the very real dangers of being funny.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bert Kreischer: Hey Big Boy
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Ever the stand-up party animal, comic Bert Kreischer riffs on parenting and family life, being a gun and pet owner, his dad discovering pot, and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bo Burnham: Make Happy
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Combining his trademark wit and self-deprecating humor with original music, Bo Burnham offers up his unique twist on life in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: The Comedy Lineup
Stand-Up Comedy.description: A diverse group of up-and-coming comedians perform 15-minute sets in this stand-up comedy showcase series.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Janelle James, Matteo Lane, Aisling Bea

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bo Burnham: what.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: What's Wrong with People?
Stand-Up Comedy.description: With his uproarious tirade on modern behavior and decorum, the popular comic tackles the question we've all asked in this hilarious standup special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Seth Meyers: Lobby Baby

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: Irresponsible
Stand-Up Comedy.description: As a father of three on his second marriage, Kevin Hart proves that being him is indeed a tall order in a fresh special inspired by his own mistakes.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ali Wong: Hard Knock Wife
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Two years after the hit "Baby Cobra," Ali Wong is back with another baby bump -- and a torrent of hilarious truths about marriage and motherhood.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: The Standups
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedy's freshest voices take the stage in LA for half-hour specials packed with sly jokes, hilarious anecdotes and awkward confessions.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Rachel Feinstein, Kyle Kinane, Joe List

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Trevor Noah: Afraid of the Dark
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The "Daily Show" host ponders the perils of naming countries, how traffic lights turn New Yorkers invincible and why you shouldn't drink in Scotland.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ali Wong: Baby Cobra
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Ali Wong's stand-up special delves into her sexual adventures, hoarding, the rocky road to pregnancy, and why feminism is terrible.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Trevor Noah: Son of Patricia
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "Daily Show" host Trevor Noah touches on tacos, runaway snakes, camping, racism immunity and lessons he learned from his mother in this comedy special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin James: Never Don't Give Up

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Gaffigan: Beyond the Pale
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Jim Gaffigan cuts loose on a variety of topics, including Hot Pockets, holidays, Catholicism and his favorite activity: doing nothing.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jo Koy: Comin' In Hot
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Jo Koy takes center stage in Hawaii and shares his candid take on cultural curiosities, filter-free fatherhood and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ray Romano: Right Here, Around the Corner

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tom Segura: Disgraceful

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Iliza Shlesinger: Elder Millennial

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Hasan Minhaj: Homecoming King

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Gabriel lglesias: I’m Sorry For What I Said When I Was Hungry

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tig Notaro Happy To Be Here

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kathleen Madigan: Bothering Jesus

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Wanda Sykes: Not Normal

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katherine Ryan: Glitter Room

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tig

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Garfunkel and Oates: Trying to be Special

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Amy Schumer: The Leather Special

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Maria Bamford: Old Baby

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Franco Escamilla: Bienvenido al mundo

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sofía Niño de Rivera: Selección Natural

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Franco Escamilla: Por la anécdota

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Dieter Nuhr: Nuhr in Berlin

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Gad Gone Wild

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sofía Niño de Rivera: Exposed

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Francesco De Carlo: Cose di questo mondo

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kavin Jay: Everybody Calm Down!

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fary Is the New Black

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Alex Fernández: The Best Comedian in the World

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Amit Tandon: Family Tandoncies

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Enissa Amani: Ehrenwort

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Carlos Ballarta: El amor es de putos

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mau Nieto: Viviendo sobrio… desde el bar

Stand-Up Comedy.title: David Batra: Elefanten i rummet

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fakkah Fuzz: Almost Banned

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Alan Saldaña: Mi vida de pobre

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Whindersson Nunes: Adult

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Hans Teeuwen: Real Rancour

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Grillo vs Grillo

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Park Na-rae: Glamour Warning

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Edoardo Ferrario: Temi caldi

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fadily Camara : La plus drôle de tes copines

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Luciano Mellera: Infantiloide

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ricardo Quevedo: Los amargados somos más

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jimmy Carr: Funny Business

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Greg Davies: You Magnificent Beast

Stand-Up Comedy.title: RUSSELL BRAND: RE:BIRTH

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Russell Howard: Recalibrate

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bridget Christie: Stand Up for Her

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Neal Brennan: 3 Mics

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Demetri Martin: The Overthinker

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ellen DeGeneres: Relatable

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Stand Up and Away! with Brian Regan

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Historical Roasts

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bumping Mics with Jeff Ross & Dave Attell

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tiffany Haddish Presents: They Ready

Stand-Up Comedy.title: The Best of Rafał Rutkowski Olka Szczęśniak
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "Recipe for Life" star Rafał Rutkowski and Comedy Lab's Olka Szczęśniak serve up humorous impressions and wry wit at Warsaw's Klub Hybrydy.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: The Degenerates

Stand-Up Comedy.title: The Honeymoon Stand Up Special

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Russell Peters vs. the World

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ladies Up

Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Prashasti Singh, Kaneez Surka, Niveditha Prakasam

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Zona Rosa

Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Manu NNa, Ana Julia Yeyé, Ray Contreras

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katarzyna Piasecka, Rafał Pacześ Seriously Funny

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Queens vs. Kings

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Lugar de Mulher

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Rafał Banaś, Michał Leja Laugh out Loud

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mariusz Kałamaga, Karol Kopiec, Wiolka Walaszczyk Hilarious Trio
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedians Mariusz Kałamaga, Karol Kopiec and Wiolka Walaszczyk deliver an eclectic and energetic stand-up show at Klub Hybrydy in Warsaw.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Mariusz Kałamaga, Karol Kopiec, Wiolka Walaszczyk

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tomasz Jachimek, Jacek Stramik Laugh at Live
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Writer, actor and satirist Tomasz Jachimek teams up with comedian Jacek Stramik for a night of subversive stand-up at Klub Hybrydy in Warsaw.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Karol Modzelewski, Łukasz „Lotek” Lodkowski No Offense
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Charismatic comedy pals Karol Modzelewski and Łukasz "Lotek" Lodkowski bring their mischievous brand of humor to Warsaw's Klub Hybrydy.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Cheuk Wan-Chi: Two Night Stand

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Aziz Ansari: RIGHT NOW

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Amy Schumer Growing

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Steve Martin and Martin Short: An Evening You Will Forget for the Rest of Your Life
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Longtime pals and showbiz icons Steve Martin and Martin Short share countless quips, catchy tunes and hilarious stories about their lives in comedy.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chris Rock: Tamborine

Stand-Up Comedy.title: ADAM SANDLER 100% FRESH

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Richard Pryor: Live in Concert

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: I'm Sorry You Feel That Way

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fortune Feimster: Sweet & Salty

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: Paper Tiger

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tom Segura: Mostly Stories

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Gaffigan: Cinco

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chris D'Elia: Man on Fire

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tom Papa: You're Doing Great!

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin James: Sweat the Small Stuff

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Maz Jobrani: Immigrant

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Aditi Mittal: Things They Wouldn't Let Me Say

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Agustín Aristarán: Soy Rada

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Eddie Murphy: Delirious
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Flashing the wild stand-up comedy that made him a household name, Eddie Murphy unleashes uncensored observations and parodies in this 1983 live show.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Dana Carvey: Straight White Male, 60
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Emmy-winning comedian Dana Carvey blends pitch-perfect takes on big personalities with so-true-it-hurts stories from his life as a dad of millennials.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Colin Quinn: The New York Story
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The "SNL" veteran performs his off-Broadway show about the history of New York and the people who shape its personality. Directed by Jerry Seinfeld.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fred Armisen: Standup For Drummers
Stand-Up Comedy.description: For an audience of drummers, comedian Fred Armisen shares and demonstrates his thoughts on musical genres, drummer quirks, regional accents and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Colin Quinn: Red State Blue State
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comedian Colin Quinn calls out the hypocrisies of the left and the right in this special based on his politically charged Off-Broadway show.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Norm Macdonald: Hitler's Dog, Gossip & Trickery
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In this new stand-up special, Norm Macdonald delivers sly, deadpan observations from an older -- and perhaps even wiser -- point of view.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Michael Che Matters
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "SNL" star Michael Che takes on hot-button topics like inequality, homophobia and gentrification in this stand-up set filmed live in Brooklyn.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tracy Morgan: Staying Alive
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In his first special since his serious car accident, Tracy Morgan cracks jokes about life in a coma, his second marriage and his family's dark side.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sarah Silverman A Speck of Dust
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In her first comedy special post-health scare, Sarah Silverman shares a mix of fun facts, sad truths and yeah-she-just-went-there moments.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Colin Quinn: Unconstitutional
Stand-Up Comedy.description: New York comedian Colin Quinn writes and stars in this live one-man stage show that dissects and deconstructs U.S. constitutional history.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Demetri Martin: Live (At the Time)
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Demetri Martin brings his off-kilter take on acoustic guitar, hairless cats, color schemes, and the word "nope" to Washington in his original special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Arguing with Myself
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Playing straight man to partners half his size, ventriloquist Jeff Dunham -- one of America's funniest comics -- slays audiences across the country.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Garlin: Our Man In Chicago
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Jeff Garlin (unintentionally) celebrates his 37th year of stand-up and shares his learnings on love, loss, success and food addiction.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Maria Bamford: The Special Special Special
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Spend an evening with gleeful, oh-so-awkward Maria Bamford via her cozy, shot-at-home comedy special, which has a two-person audience: her parents.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Maria Bamford, Wayne Federman, Jackie Kashian

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Joe Rogan: Strange Times
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Outspoken as ever, comedian Joe Rogan takes on current culture, pro wrestling, pot laws, cats, vegans and more in a stand-up special shot in Boston.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Gaffigan: King Baby
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Jim Gaffigan offers up his take on bacon, bowling and other weighty topics in this stand-up performance filmed live in Austin on his 2008 comedy tour.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bert Kreischer: Secret Time
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Shirtless comic Bert Kreischer relays personal secrets and stories about being a cool -- if not always responsible -- dad in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Marco Luque: Tamo Junto
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Eclectic character comedian Marco Luque plays himself in this stand-up special about relationships, regional differences and his own love of movies.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Unhinged in Hollywood
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Unfiltered ventriloquist Jeff Dunham brings his ragtag crew of puppet pals to Hollywood for big laughs about celebrity culture and California living.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mike Birbiglia: What I Should Have Said Was Nothing: Tales from My Secret Public Journal
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Mike Birbiglia performs in this live concert special that features a riotous selection of the unique insights and observations culled from his diary.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: I'm a Grown Little Man
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comedy star Kevin Hart delivers his unique perspective on work, race, family and friends with this laugh-riot comedy show.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Seth Rogen's Hilarity for Charity
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Seth Rogen and friends combine stand-up, sketches and music for an outrageous comedy special that could only come from the mind of Seth.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Seth Rogen, Ike Barinholtz, Michael Che

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Adam Devine: Best Time of Our Lives
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Frenetic comic Adam Devine talks teen awkwardness, celebrity encounters, his "Pitch Perfect" audition and more in a special from his hometown of Omaha.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Miranda Sings Live…Your Welcome
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Viral video star Miranda Sings and her real-world alter ego Colleen Ballinger share the stage in a special packed with music, comedy and "magichinry."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Reggie Watts: Spatial
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The comic innovator delivers a surreal set blending experimental songs, jokes about grits, guns and drugs, and other improvised comedy adventures.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: Let Me Explain
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Philadelphia funnyman Kevin Hart takes the stage in front of a sold-out crowd at Madison Square Garden, part of his hit "Let Me Explain" world tour.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: All Over the Map
Stand-Up Comedy.description: America's most beloved ventriloquist hits the road, bringing along all of his most popular pals, including Achmed, Peanut and Walter.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tim Allen: ReWires America
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Standup star Tim Allen storms the stage for a set chock-full of observations about powerful cars, beautiful lawns and more of the things he loves.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katt Williams: Live
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Outspoken comedian Katt Williams pokes fun at a variety of topics, including sex, relationships, parenthood and trying to make it as an entertainer.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katt Williams: American Hustle (The Movie)
Stand-Up Comedy.description: An aspiring actor leaves Hollywood and takes to the road to do stand-up after he's cast in a series of increasingly stereotypical "black" roles.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Katt Williams, Da Brat, Snoop Dogg

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tim Allen: Men Are Pigs
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Standup comedian Tim Allen delivers a set dedicated to "men stuff" like lawn care, power tools and why he grunts like an animal.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mike Epps: Only One Mike
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In a raw stand-up comedy special, Mike Epps mixes it up as he tackles sexual misconduct, special ed, aging body parts and much more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Daniel Sosa: Maleducado
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In his second stand-up special, Daniel Sosa reminisces about his childhood, ponders Mexican traditions and points out a major problem with "Coco."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Arango y Sanint: Ríase el show
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Colombian stand-up comedians Antonio Sanint and Julián Arango impersonate an Argentine visitor and a cabbie, and a pair of dirty old men at the opera.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Martin Matte: La vie, la mort...eh la la..!
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Quebecois comedy star Martin Matte serves up embarrassing personal stories, a solution for social media trolls and more in this unpredictable special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Anthony Jeselnik: Thoughts and Prayers
Stand-Up Comedy.description: There's no subject too dark as the comedian skewers taboos and riffs on national tragedies before pulling back the curtain on his provocative style.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Marc Maron: Too Real
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Battle-scarred stand-up comedian Marc Maron unleashes a storm of ideas about meditation, mortality, documentary films and our weird modern world.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Anthony Jeselnik: Fire in the Maternity Ward
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Forging his own comedic boundaries, Anthony Jeselnik revels in getting away with saying things others can't in this stand-up special shot in New York.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tiffany Haddish: She Ready! From the Hood To Hollywood!
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedic breakout Tiffany Haddish delivers a riotous stand-up ripe with the unpretentious and filthy tales of her meteoric rise to stardom.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: Let It Go
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The musings of comedian Bill Burr are let loose in this special, which was filmed at the historic Fillmore Auditorium in San Francisco.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Aziz Ansari Live at Madison Square Garden
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comedian and TV star Aziz Ansari ("Parks and Recreation") delivers his sharp-witted take on immigrants, relationships and the food industry.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Hannibal Buress: Comedy Camisado
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In a special packed with stealthy humor, Hannibal Buress tackles zipper etiquette, the legacy of steroids and the fallout from his Bill Cosby routine.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katt Williams: The Pimp Chronicles: Pt. 1
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In this 2006 show, comic Katt Williams uses his edgy style and personal experiences to paint a sassy, hilarious portrait of life in black America.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Marc Maron: Thinky Pain
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Alternative comic Marc Maron is back on stage in New York to talk Chinese food, drug abuse, sex in hotel rooms and life with his girlfriend.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: You People Are All the Same
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Funnyman Bill Burr takes the stage to uncork a profanity-laced, incisive routine that pokes fun at plastic surgery, reality TV, gold diggers and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Lynne Koplitz: Hormonal Beast
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Unabashed comedian Lynne Koplitz offers a woman's take on being crazy, the benefits of childlessness and the three things all men really want.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Aziz Ansari: Buried Alive
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "Parks and Recreation" star Aziz Ansari takes the stage to share his unfiltered views on adulthood, babies, marriage, love and more in the modern era.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Burr: Walk Your Way Out
Stand-Up Comedy.description: No-nonsense comic Bill Burr takes the stage in Nashville and riffs on fast food, overpopulation, dictators and gorilla sign language.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Moshe Kasher: Live in Oakland
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comic Moshe Kasher returns to his home turf of Oakland for this stand-up special that has him sharing uproarious stories about the people he's met.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Theo Von: No Offense
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Southern charmer Theo Von offers up a twisted take on his dating mishaps, meeting Brad Pitt, chasing down fugitive chimpanzees and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jen Kirkman: I'm Gonna Die Alone (And I Feel Fine)
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Jen Kirkman delivers some sharp, hilarious truths about divorce, kids, sex and turning 40 in this Netflix original comedy special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Jefferies : BARE
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Nothing is sacred in this show from Australian comic Jim Jefferies, whether it’s the mother of his child, auditioning disabled actors, or gun control.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Michelle Wolf: Joke Show
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Michelle Wolf takes on outrage culture, massages, childbirth, feminism and much more (like otters) in a stand-up special from New York City.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Gaffigan: Mr. Universe
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Funnyman Jim Gaffigan offers up his unique take on everything from Disney World to overweight whales in this live show from Washington, D.C.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Anjelah Johnson: Not Fancy
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The actress, comedian and YouTube sensation riffs on everything from nail salons and Gypsies to Mexican moms and super-sleuthing Liam Neeson.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Sebastian Maniscalco delivers an expressive stand-up at the legendary Beacon Theatre on Whole Foods, family nicknames and dodging obnoxious neighbors.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Stay Hungry
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Sebastian Maniscalco brings an acerbically unique approach to peacocks on planes, life hacks, rich in-laws and life's annoyances in this comedy special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jim Gaffigan: Obsessed
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comic Jim Gaffigan delivers his sardonic take on topics like eating, exercise, weddings and his five kids in this live stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Nikki Glaser: Bangin’
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Nikki Glaser bares all in a blistering stand-up special about sex, sobriety and getting over her own insecurities. And she won't spare you the details.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tiffany Haddish: Black Mitzvah
Stand-Up Comedy.description: On her 40th birthday, Tiffany Haddish drops a bombastic special studded with singing, dancing and raunchy reflections on her long road to womanhood.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Leslie Jones: Time Machine
Stand-Up Comedy.description: From trying to seduce Prince to battling sleep apnea, Leslie Jones traces her evolution as an adult in a joyfully raw and outrageous stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Beside Himself
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Jeff Dunham takes the stage in Dallas with his old pals Peanut, Walter, José Jalapeño, Bubba J and Achmed to poke fun at himself and American culture.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Whitney Cummings: Can I Touch It?
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In her fourth stand-up special, Whitney Cummings returns to her hometown of Washington, D.C., and riffs on modern feminism, technology and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Deon Cole: Cole Hearted
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Embracing his belief that comedy is the last raw form of expression, Deon Cole explains the right time to thank Jesus and the wrong time to say "welp."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Arsenio Hall: Smart & Classy
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In his first stand-up special, Arsenio Hall discusses getting older, the changing times and culture, social issues and even bothersome baby toes.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: David A. Arnold: Fat Ballerina
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Finally comfortable in his skin, seasoned comic David A. Arnold shares his talent for doing nothing, how he's petty and why divorce saves marriages.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Vir Das: For India
Stand-Up Comedy.description: From the Vedas to Vasco da Gama to vacuous Bollywood plotlines, comedian Vir Das celebrates the history of India with his one-of-a-kind perspective.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: John Leguizamo's Latin History for Morons
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In this one-man Broadway show, John Leguizamo finds humor and heartbreak as he traces 3,000 years of Latin history in an effort to help his bullied son.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katherine Ryan: In Trouble
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comic Katherine Ryan reminisces about unusual relationships, life in the hometown she hates and the time she enraged an entire nation.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Cristela Alonzo: Lower Classy
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The irrepressible Alonzo skewers Latino stereotypes, pricey luxuries and her mother's tough-love parenting in a night of sly and infectious comedy.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Brian Regan: Nunchucks and Flamethrowers
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Brian Regan takes relatable family humor to new heights as he talks board games, underwear elastic and looking for hot dogs in all the wrong places.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Tom Papa Live in New York City
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Tom Papa riffs on the trials of married life, fatherhood in the 21st century, domestic pets and more in his stand-up show.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chelsea Peretti: One of the Greats
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "Brooklyn Nine-Nine" star Chelsea Peretti showcases her diverse talents in this dark yet silly reimagining of the comedy special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Iliza Shlesinger: Confirmed Kills
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The stand-up sensation tackles TV's "Shark Tank," what it means to be a woman and how to deal with the lawless party goblin that lives in us all.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ron White: If You Quit Listening, I'll Shut Up
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Ron “Tater Salad” White dishes out his signature brand of cynicism, riffing on sex, celebrity and the sinister habits of wild geese.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Judah Friedlander: America Is the Greatest Country in the United States
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Deadpan comic and self-proclaimed world champion Judah Friedlander performs over several nights in New York, explaining why America is No. 1.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Russell Peters: Notorious
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Global comedy star Russell Peters leaves no ethnic or cultural stereotype unsatirized in this outrageous standup appearance in Sydney, Australia.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Craig Ferguson: Tickle Fight
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Cheeky comic Craig Ferguson keeps it casual as he discusses '70s porn, Japanese toilets and his mildly crime-filled days as a talk show host.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: Laugh at My Pain
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Sometimes edgy and always hilarious, comedian Kevin Hart shines in this theatrical version of his record-breaking 2011 live tour.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jack Whitehall: At Large
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Jack Whitehall takes the stage to tell stories about drinking, drugs, a Google Maps van and his ongoing rivalry with Robert Pattinson.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Todd Barry: Spicy Honey
Stand-Up Comedy.description: With bone-dry wit, stand-up comic Todd Barry dissects texting emergencies, Hitler's taste in wine, pricey soap, cheap pizza and much more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Joan Rivers: Don't Start with Me
Stand-Up Comedy.description: At 78, Joan Rivers has no interest in slowing down, and no one's immune from her caustic barbs in this stand-up special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Foxworthy and Larry the Cable Guy: We’ve Been Thinking...
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Grammy-nominated comedians Jeff Foxworthy and Larry the Cable Guy bring their distinctive brand of humor to a packed crowd in Minneapolis.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Jeff Foxworthy, Larry the Cable Guy

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Wyatt Cenac: Brooklyn
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Wyatt Cenac heads to Brooklyn to share his observations on the borough that's the backdrop for three sitcoms and a reality show about cheesemongers.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Felipe Esparza: They're Not Going to Laugh at You
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "Last Comic Standing" winner Felipe Esparza runs riot in his first comedy special with his wry comments on life as a wild man from East Los Angeles.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Brad Paisley's Comedy Rodeo
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Country music star Brad Paisley hosts a night of music and laughs with comics Nate Bargatze, John Heffron, Jon Reep, Sarah Tiana and Mike E. Winfield.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Brad Paisley, Nate Bargatze, John Heffron

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Mo Amer: The Vagabond
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Arab-American comedian Mo Amer recounts his life as a refugee comic, from traveling with the name Mohammed to his long path to citizenship.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Judd Apatow: The Return
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Judd Apatow returns to stand-up comedy after 25 years, riffing on living with three women, amusing moments from his career and much more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Christina P: Mother Inferior
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Christina Pazsitzky hits Seattle with a biting dose of reality, telling truths about her childhood, getting older and the horrors of giving birth.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chingo Bling: They Can't Deport Us All
Stand-Up Comedy.description: On point and larger than life, rapper and stand-up comic Chingo Bling gathers his funniest friends for a rambunctious take on Tex-Mex culture.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Controlled Chaos
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Politically incorrect and often raunchy humor pepper ventriloquist Dunham's live concert performance featuring characters Walter, Achmed and Peanut.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Relative Disaster
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Ventriloquist Jeff Dunham brings his rude and slightly demented posse of puppets to Ireland for a gleeful skewering of family and politics.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Felipe Neto: My Life Makes No Sense
Stand-Up Comedy.description: YouTube sensation Felipe Neto brings the stories from his autobiographical book "Não Faz Sentido!" to the stage in this comedy special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Rory Scovel Tries Stand-Up for the First Time
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Rory Scovel storms the stage in Atlanta, where he shares unfocused thoughts about things that mystify him, relationships and the "Thong Song."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Hari Kondabolu: Warn Your Relatives
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Hari Kondabolu breaks down identity politics, celebrity encounters, his mango obsession and more in an unpredictable stand-up comedy special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham: Minding the Monsters
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Jeff Dunham returns with a haunted house full of his hysterical entourage, and each character stars in its own horror movie trailer.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Lucas Brothers: On Drugs
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Deadpan twin comics Keith and Kenny Lucas take the stage in Brooklyn with a set that touches on drugs, race, Deion Sanders, teachers and O.J. Simpson.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jeff Dunham's Very Special Christmas Special
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Politically incorrect, sometimes raunchy ventriloquist Jeff Dunham is joined by his irreverent cast of characters in this hilarious Christmas special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Ralphie May: Imperfectly Yours
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian Ralphie May takes to the Las Vegas stage with his raw, rollicking take on men's fashion, racism, sex and even waffles. Filmed live in 2013.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chris D'Elia: Incorrigible
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Stand-up comedian Chris D'Elia covers everything from how to improve the NFL to why dating is evil and that babies should grow up before they're born.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Whitney Cummings: Money Shot
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedy Central roast veteran Whitney Cummings gets the stage to herself in this debut special, which finds her riffing on a wide range of topics.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Natalia Valdebenito: Gritona
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Chile's Natalia Valdebenito hits Santiago's Teatro Caupolicán with a one-woman show steeped in irony, a dash of improv and her own personal style.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sam Kinison: Breaking the Rules
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The one-time preacher shakes and shudders as he tears into subjects including sex, marriage, religion, drugs and famine in this HBO special.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Sam Kinison: Live in Vegas
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Standup legend Sam Kinison is at his screaming best as he storms the stage in Sin City to get a few things off his chest.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Liss Pereira: Reteniendo líquidos
Stand-Up Comedy.description: A pregnant Liss Pereira shares hilariously uncomfortable truths about sex, love, attraction and the lies we tell in modern relationships.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Malena Pichot: Estupidez compleja
Stand-Up Comedy.description: An Argentine comedian espouses the values of feminism, speaking on topics like sex, language, abortion and why it's OK to let a man buy you dinner.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Fabrizio Copano: Solo pienso en mi
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Fabrizio Copano takes audience participation to the next level in this stand-up set while reflecting on sperm banks, family WhatsApp groups and more.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Joe Rogan: Triggered
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Unleashing his inquisitive, intense comedic style, Rogan explores everything from raising kids and Santa Claus to pot gummies and talking to dolphins.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Katt Williams: Great America
Stand-Up Comedy.description: The King of underground comedy delivers unflinching riffs on the American political climate, racial tensions, sex and his disdain for roast beef.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Saverio Raimondo: Il Satiro Parlante
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Italian comic and satirist Saverio Raimondo regales a Milan crowd with tales of online antics, awkward injuries and white-knuckle flights.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Hicks: Sane Man
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Filmed in 1989 at a turning point in comedian Bill Hicks's career, this rare onstage performance captures him spouting off on a variety of topics.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: David Cross: Making America Great Again!
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Cross skewers Donald Trump, religious taboos and American swagger in a provocative night of comedy at the Paramount Theatre in Austin, Texas.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Cedric the Entertainer: Live from the Ville
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Donning his signature suit and fedora, the dapper comic offers a unique spin on getting old, the presidential election and "Honky Tonk Badonkadonk."

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Lavell Crawford: Can a Brother Get Some Love?
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "Last Comic Standing" runner-up Lavell Crawford lords over a hometown crowd at St. Louis's Orpheum Theatre, raking in the love -- and the laughs.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: W. Kamau Bell: Private School Negro
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Comedian W. Kamau Bell muses on parenting in the Trump era, "free speech" dustups, woke children's TV and his fear of going off the grid.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Bill Hicks: Relentless
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In one of his most iconic performances, late comedian Bill Hicks demonstrates what made him such a singular talent and a force to be reckoned with.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: D.L. Hughley: Contrarian
Stand-Up Comedy.description: D.L. Hughley riffs on hot-button political issues, celebrity scandals, his mother's tough love and more in a rapid-fire stand-up show in Philadelphia.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Iliza Shlesinger: War Paint
Stand-Up Comedy.description: "Last Comic Standing" winner Iliza Shlesinger unleashes her acerbic, stream-of-conscious comedy on an unsuspecting audience in her hometown of Dallas.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Iliza Shlesinger: Freezing Hot
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Smart and brazen comedian Iliza Shlesinger applies her fresh, laugh-out-loud perspective to the universal struggles between men and women.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Chelsea Handler: Uganda Be Kidding Me Live
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In her first Netflix stand-up comedy special, Chelsea Handler recounts her African adventures (and provides hilarious photographic evidence).

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jen Kirkman: Just Keep Livin’?
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Incisive comic Jen Kirkman gets real about women's bodies, the value of alone time and an Italian private tour guide who may have been a ghost.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Natalia Valdebenito: El especial
Stand-Up Comedy.description: A Chilean comedian fuses activism with irreverence for a stand-up set filled with jokes about misogyny, reproductive rights and respecting women.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Jo Koy: Live from Seattle
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Between raising a teenage boy and growing up with a Filipino mother, stand-up comic Jo Koy has been through a lot. He's here to tell you all about it.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: Seriously Funny
Stand-Up Comedy.description: With his unique hip-hop style delivery, African American stand-up comedian Kevin Hart expounds on life at a sold-out concert performance.

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Def Comedy Jam 25
Stand-Up Comedy.description: In this special live event, giants of stand-up come together to commemorate the 25th anniversary of Russell Simmons's groundbreaking "Def Comedy Jam."
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Dave Chappelle, Steve Harvey, Cedric the Entertainer

Stand-Up Comedy.title: Kevin Hart: What Now?
Stand-Up Comedy.description: Frenetic comic Kevin Hart hits Philadelphia and dishes on suburban wildlife, jean shorts and the fine art of getting even with a 7-year-old.
Stand-Up Comedy.starring: Kevin Hart, Don Cheadle, Halle Berry

Thriller.title: Road to Perdition
Thriller.description: After his wife and son are murdered, a Depression-era hit man goes on the run with his surviving son to exact revenge on the man who wronged him.
Thriller.starring: Tom Hanks, Paul Newman, Jude Law

Thriller.title: Taxi Driver
Thriller.description: Enraged by New York's moral rot and urban decay, an unhinged cab driver goes mad, plotting an assassination and saving a teen sex worker.
Thriller.starring: Robert De Niro, Jodie Foster, Cybill Shepherd

Thriller.title: Drive
Thriller.description: A Hollywood stuntman and getaway driver is lured from his isolated life by a lovely neighbor -- until her violent husband is released from prison.
Thriller.starring: Ryan Gosling, Carey Mulligan, Bryan Cranston

Thriller.title: The Platform
Thriller.description: A slab of food descends floor by floor in a prison. The inmates above eat heartily, leaving those below starving and desperate. A rebellion is imminent.
Thriller.starring: Iván Massagué, Antonia San Juan, Zorion Eguileor

Thriller.title: Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy
Thriller.description: This gripping thriller about Cold War espionage follows an English spy as he returns to MI-6 under suspicion that he's become a Soviet operative.
Thriller.starring: Gary Oldman, Benedict Cumberbatch, Tom Hardy

Thriller.title: The Hateful Eight
Thriller.description: Years after the Civil War, a bounty hunter and his captive are waylaid by a Wyoming blizzard and hole up in a way station with six dicey strangers.
Thriller.starring: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh

Thriller.title: The Wicker Man
Thriller.description: Pious detective Neil Howie gets more than he bargained for when he probes a young girl's disappearance in this harrowing psychological thriller.
Thriller.starring: Edward Woodward, Britt Ekland, Christopher Lee

Thriller.title: Mystic River
